description: Contents: ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muḥammad Baṭalyawsī, Kitab al-Hadaiq (ff. 1r-34v). al-Kalām ‛alā al-masā’il al-ṯalāṯ (ff. 36r-53v). Avicenna, Risalah fi Aqsam al- 'ulum (ff. 54r-61v). Avicenna, al-Ḥikmah al-mashriqīyah (ff. 62v-154r).
title: Collection of philosophical texts
author: Baṭalyawsī, ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muḥammad
